tool.name: cooler csort with tabix
tool.description: Sort and index a contact list.

param.name: input
param.label: Select a file with the coordinates of the pairs (minimum 4 columns with chromosome and position for each mate).

param.name: c1
param.label: field number in the input file (starting from 1) of the chromosome of mate 1.

param.name: p1
param.label: field number in the input file (starting from 1) of the position of mate 1.

param.name: c2
param.label: field number in the input file (starting from 1) of the chromosome of mate 2.

param.name: p2
param.label: field number in the input file (starting from 1) of the position of mate 2.

data.name: output
data.label: sorted and indexed contact list of $input.name

tool.help:
**cooler csort** tool developped by mirnylab see https://github.com/open2c/cooler and https://cooler.readthedocs.io/en/latest/cli.html#cooler-csort
command-line::
cooler csort -i tabix -c1 c1 -c2 c2 -p1 p1 -p2 p2 -o output input chromosomeSize
